title: Can't reconnect
body: I just got disconnected from a game cause my computer crashed but now when I load into the client it just says "game still in progress" with no reconnect option

replies.body: And this is why I wanted to post in gd

I wasn't able to see any issues with the servers.  If you're still having issues then your network might be having problems getting to the game servers.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and test it through a custom game to make sure everything is in order.  Sorry that happened to you, and I hope it helps!
